body:
Is there a way to encode this in Spack?  Like I think `gcc@4.8.5` is the first fully c++11 capable version, but I was wondering if there was some special way of encoding this more generically in Spack so that it doesn't need to be enumerated for *every* compiler / toolchain.  It's kind of related to #7612 but I don't think it's as explicit.

I can PR something if there is an official approach here :smile:
title: cmake 3.11.0 requires C++11 compiler
